TheUnnamable.text: You hear the scurrying and squeaking of a horde of rats from inside the walls. Abruptly, you realize that they are moving to surround you. Pass a Speed (-1) check to make it to the front door first. If you fail, you are lost in time and space.

RiverDocks.text: As you look out across the waves, you feel strangely compelled to throw yourself into the ocean"s watery embrace. Pass a Will (+1) check or you are lost in time and space.

UnvisitedIsle.text: Looking up at the night sky from the island, you see constellations that you"ve never seen before. The entire night sky is different here! Lose 1 Sanity and gain 1 Clue token.
